text: 3.12 Ais 34.4, Mai 1.4, 1 Ko 1.7, Tat 2.13, 2 Pi 3.10 Nɨbi anɨgɨl gɨ dad amɨl, God binɨb kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab ñɨn ak kod yenɨmɨb. Ñɨn anɨb ak kasek ownɨmuŋ agɨl, wog kɨles tɨmel gɨl kod yenɨmɨb. Ñɨn anɨb ak, wɨsɨp adekab alaŋ yɨn gɨl, tɨmel gɨl kul gɨnɨgab. Pen lum awl tap tɨtay mɨdeb okok mɨdupsek, yɨn gɨl ñɨg bad lɨnɨgab.
